solution_line_template: She will read {english_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{english_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={english_pages_tomorrow}>>{english_pages_tomorrow} pages for English.
She will read {science_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{science_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={science_pages_tomorrow}>>{science_pages_tomorrow} pages for Science.
She will read {civics_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{civics_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={civics_pages_tomorrow}>>{civics_pages_tomorrow} pages for Civics.
She will read {chinese_pages} pages / {fraction_denominator} = <<{chinese_pages}/{fraction_denominator}={chinese_pages_tomorrow}>>{chinese_pages_tomorrow} pages for Chinese.

Melody will read a total of {english_pages_tomorrow} pages + {science_pages_tomorrow} pages + {civics_pages_tomorrow} pages + {chinese_pages_tomorrow} pages = <<{english_pages_tomorrow}+{science_pages_tomorrow}+{civics_pages_tomorrow}+{chinese_pages_tomorrow}={total_pages_tomorrow}>>{total_pages_tomorrow} pages tomorrow.
